Fries.Label: French Fries
Fries.Description: Crispy, golden-brown potato fries, deep-fried to perfection.

BurgerSteak.Label: Burger Steak
BurgerSteak.Description: A juicy grilled beef patty served with steak sauce and mixed vegetables.

PepperoniPizza.Label: Pepperoni Pizza
PepperoniPizza.Description: A classic pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices, melted cheese, and rich tomato sauce.

IceCream.Label: Ice Cream
IceCream.Description: A delicious frozen dessert available in multiple flavors like chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry.

Milkshake.Label: Milkshake
Milkshake.Description: A smooth and creamy drink blended with milk, ice cream, and sugar.
